note.p: Tea merchant and philanthropist. Partner in the firm Peek Brothers and Winch, tea importers. Chairman of the Howard Association for penal reform. Provided funds for church-building in East and West Dulwich.
The Dulwich Society, Who was who in Dulwich, https://www.dulwichsociety.com/local-history/797-who-was-who-in-dulwich (accessed 28 January 2021)
